title: Billu
short_cast: Irrfan Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Lara Dutta, Rajpal Yadav, Om Puri, Asrani, Manoj Joshi
cast: Irrfan Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, Lara Dutta, Rajpal Yadav, Om Puri, Asrani, Manoj Joshi
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: In an Indian village, a struggling barber sees his luck begin to turn when residents learn that a famous actor he once knew is coming to town.
